article_metadata.title: For president: Kasich, Clinton | The Charlotte Observer

og.description: For many North Carolina voters, the 2016 presidential election demands a different kind of calculation. Do you vote for a candidate who reflects your values and policy preferences, or do you vote to keep one dangerous candidate from becoming president?
og.title: For president: Kasich, Clinton
